exceptions.exn: The LHS of Rsqr_0 0² does not match any subterm of the goal

original: unfold Cmod. rewrite Rsqr_0. rewrite Rsqr_0. rewrite Rplus_0_l. apply sqrt_eq_0. lra. reflexivity.
